name: Chris North 0001
content: Chris North InfoVis Lab @ Virginia Tech Chris North Professor Department of Computer Science and Center for Human-Computer Interaction Associate Director, Sanghani Center for AI and Data Analytics Virginia Tech Contact: north at vt·edü (540)231-2458 (Office) (540)231-6931 (CS Department) Office: Data and Decision Sciences (DDS) building, room 472 and 466 (lab) Office hours: posted here Mailing address: Department of Computer Science Virginia Tech Blacksburg, VA 24061-0106 Research: InfoVis Lab @ Virginia Tech DDS 132 Visualization Classroom Publications Chris's Google Scholar page Research areas:  Visual Analytics, Information Visualization, Human-Computer Interaction, Human-AI Interaction, Data Science Basic research topics: Data visualization and interactive analytics; human-in-the-loop, interactive machine learning; semantic interaction; usability in data science; immersive analytics; large high-resolution displays and interaction techniques; visual text analytics and sensemaking; insight-based evaluation of visualization; multiple-view techniques. Applied research domains: Intelligence analysis, cyber security, digital humanities, geographic information systems, bioinformatics. Teach: CS 3114 Data Structures and Algorithms CMDA 3654 Data Analytics and Visualization CS 3724 Human-Computer Interaction CS 3744 GUI Programming and Graphics CS 4604 Database Management Systems CS 5764 Information Visualization CS 6604 Visual Analytics CS 6724 Display-Wall User Interfaces CS 6724 Human-AI Interaction Computational Modeling and Data Analytics (CMDA) degree program Graduate Certificate in Data Analytics Recent Service: Co-Organizer, MLUI 2018 & 2019: Machine Learning from User Interactions for Visualization and Analytics, An IEEE VIS workshop Associate Editor, Information Visualization More Info: Chris's CV with short bio VTURCS VT Undergraduate Research in CS Visionarium Sanghani Center for AI and Data Analytics Center for Human-Computer Interaction Institute for Creativity, Arts, and Technology Hume Center for National Security and Technology Grace Covenant Presbyterian Church, PCA http://people.cs.vt.edu/~north/
